DOC.brief_summary: The main goal of the proposed project is to assess treatment-induced changes of electrophysiological and psychophysiological correlates of the capacity to regulate emotion, executive functions, and clinical measures in individuals with (complex) posttraumatic stress disorder, dissociative disorders, or borderline personality disorder in naturalistic inpatient and outpatient settings.
DOC.brief_title: Emotional and Cognitive Self-regulation, an EEG Study
DOC.criteria: right handedness ability to undergo EEG measurement/psychophysiological measurement regular substance use acute suicidality comorbid psychosis
